member.name: P:Wiry.Base32.Base32Encoding.Standard
member.summary: Represent standard encoding defined in RFC 4648

member.name: P:Wiry.Base32.Base32Encoding.ZBase32
member.summary: Represent z-base-32 encoding by Zooko O'Whielacronx

member.name: M:Wiry.Base32.Base32Encoding.GetString(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, encodes bytes a string.

member.name: M:Wiry.Base32.Base32Encoding.ToBytes(System.String)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, decodes string data to bytes.

member.name: M:Wiry.Base32.Base32Encoding.ToBytes(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, decodes string data to bytes.
